mapper.select: SELECT ta.area_id AS areaId, ta.area_name AS areaName, tr.area_id AS parentCode, tr.area_name AS parentName FROM t_area ta LEFT JOIN t_area tr ON ta.parent_area_id = tr.area_id WHERE ta.parent_area_id > 0 LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{amount}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS `count` FROM t_area ta LEFT JOIN t_area tr ON ta.parent_area_id = tr.area_id WHERE ta.parent_area_id > 0
SELECT group_code FROM t_area ta WHERE ta.group_code LIKE CONCAT(#{code}, '%') ESCAPE '#' ORDER BY group_code DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_area(area_name, parent_area_id, group_code, `level`) VALUES(#{rto.areaName}, #{rto.parentId}, #{newcode}, #{level})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_area ta SET ta.area_name =#{rto.areaName} WHERE ta.area_id =#{rto.areaId}
